Name: Better Boyfriend
About the game: Improve your boyfriend so he’s better than all the rest! Create your avatar Create your boyfriend Nag and encourage your boyfriend to level him up… Look forward the day he makes the bed on his own! If you are vigilant, your boyfriend will learn to complete tasks without you reminding him, and will start proactively doing nice things for you!
